sub_title: Political Analyst, Manager, Election Observer, PhD Candidate
summary: Internationally orientated multi-lingual professional, experienced in international missions and security issues, political analyses, election observation and people management in the topics of diplomacy, conflict-management, peace-building, human rights, gender issues, humanitarian assistance, and development. Since 1998 I gained experience working for international governmental and non-governmental organizations in Western- and Eastern Europe, the Balkans, Northern and Southern Caucasus, Central Asia, South East Asia, the Middle East, Africa, and South America.
